section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.p1: We collect personal information that you provide to us when you create an account, purchase products, sign up for our newsletter, or contact our customer service. This information may include:
section1.p2: We also automatically collect certain information when you access our website, including your IP address, browser type, access time, and the pages you view.

section2.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
section2.p1: We use your personal information to:

list.item2: Communicate with you about orders, products, services, and promotions
list.item4: Improve our website, products, and services
list.item5: Prevent fraud and secure our website

section3.title: 3. Information Sharing
section3.p1: We do not sell, rent, or trade your personal information with third parties for marketing purposes. We may share your information with:

list.item1: Shipping partners to deliver your orders
list.item2: Payment processors to handle your transactions
list.item3: Service providers who help us operate our website and business
list.item4: Law enforcement agencies when required by law

section4.title: 4. Data Security
section4.p1: We implement reasonable security measures to protect your personal information from loss, unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. We use SSL encryption to protect sensitive information transmitted online and comply with industry security standards.

section5.title: 5. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
section5.p1: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience on our website, analyze how you use our site, and personalize content and advertisements. You can control the use of cookies through your browser settings.

section6.title: 6. Your Rights
section6.p1: Depending on your local laws, you may have the right to:

list.item4: Restrict or object to the processing of your information
list.item5: Receive your information in a portable format

section6.p2: To exercise any of these rights, please contact us using the information below.

section7.title: 7. Policy Changes
section7.p1: We may update this privacy policy from time to time to reflect changes in our business practices or to comply with legal requirements. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting a notice on our website.

section8.title: 8. Contact Us
section8.p1: If you have any questions or concerns about our privacy policy or how we handle your personal information, please contact us at:

section3.title: 3. Products and Pricing

section4.title: 4. Orders and Payment

section4.p2: We accept the payment methods listed on our website. You represent and warrant that you have the legal right to use any payment method in connection with your order.

section1.title: 1. Shipping Coverage
section1.p1: We ship to all provinces and cities nationwide. For international orders, we currently ship to the following countries: Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand, Indonesia, Philippines, and Japan.
section1.p2: If your shipping address is not within our shipping coverage, please contact customer service for assistance.

section2.title: 2. Shipping Methods
section2.p1: We offer the following shipping methods:

item1.title: Standard Shipping
item1.desc: Delivery within 3-5 business days (excluding weekends and holidays)

item2.title: Express Shipping
item2.desc: Delivery within 1-2 business days (excluding weekends and holidays)

item3.title: Same-day Delivery
item3.desc: Only available for orders placed before 10 AM and within city limits of major cities

item4.title: International Shipping
item4.desc: Delivery time ranges from 7-14 business days depending on the destination country

section3.title: 3. Shipping Costs
section3.p1: Shipping costs are calculated based on the weight, dimensions of the product, shipping method, and delivery address. Exact shipping costs will be displayed during checkout before you complete your order.
section3.p2: We offer free standard domestic shipping for orders over $100.

section4.title: 4. Order Tracking
section4.p1: After your order has been shipped, you will receive a confirmation email with a tracking number and instructions on how to track your order. You can also track your order by logging into your account on our website and accessing the 'My Orders' section.

section5.title: 5. Failed Delivery
section5.p1: If we are unable to deliver to the address you provided (e.g., no one is available to receive the package, incorrect address), the carrier will leave a notice and attempt to contact you to reschedule delivery. After three unsuccessful delivery attempts, your order will be returned to our warehouse.
section5.p2: In the event that an order is returned due to failed delivery, you will be responsible for the original shipping cost and the return shipping cost. We will refund you after deducting these costs.

section6.title: 6. Inspection Upon Receipt
section6.p1: We encourage you to inspect your order immediately upon receipt to ensure that all items are present and in good condition. If you discover any issues with your order, please contact our customer service within 48 hours of receiving your order.

section7.title: 7. Shipping Delays
section7.p1: While we strive to deliver on time, occasionally delays may occur due to factors beyond our control such as bad weather, traffic issues, or other logistical problems. In the event of a significant delay, we will notify you via email or phone.

section8.title: 8. Contact Us
section8.p1: If you have any questions about our shipping policy, please contact our customer service:

section1.title: 1. Return Conditions
section1.p1: We accept returns of products within 30 days from the delivery date, under the following conditions:

list1.item1: The product must be in its original condition, unused, undamaged, and with all tags and labels intact
list1.item2: The product must be returned in its original packaging with all accessories, user manuals, and any gifts included (if applicable)
list1.item3: You must provide proof of purchase (invoice, order confirmation email, or order number)

section1.p2: Some products cannot be returned for hygiene or health protection reasons, including:

list2.item2: Personal care products with broken seals
list2.item4: Personalized products made to customer specifications

section2.title: 2. Return Process
section2.p1: To return a product, please follow these steps:

item1.title: Contact Us
item1.desc: Send a return request via email or call our customer service. Please provide your order number, product name, and reason for return.

item2.title: Receive Return Code
item2.desc: Once your request is approved, we will send you a return code and packaging instructions.

item3.title: Package the Product
item3.desc: Pack the product carefully in its original packaging or equivalent packaging. Attach the return code to the outside of the package.

item4.title: Ship the Product
item4.desc: Ship the product to our warehouse address provided in the return instructions. You can choose to use our shipping service (fee will be deducted from the refund amount) or arrange shipping yourself.

section2.p2: We recommend using a trackable and insured shipping service, as we are not responsible for products lost or damaged during return shipping.

section3.title: 3. Refunds
section3.p1: After receiving and inspecting the returned product, we will notify you about the status of your refund. If approved, the refund will be processed as follows:

item1.title: Refund Method
item1.desc: Refunds will be issued to the original payment method you used to make the purchase. For cash on delivery (COD) payments, refunds will be processed via bank transfer.

item2.title: Processing Time
item2.desc: Refunds are typically processed within 5-7 business days after we receive and inspect the returned product. Depending on your bank or payment method, it may take an additional 3-10 business days for the refund to appear in your account.

item3.title: Return Shipping Costs
item3.desc: In case of returns due to customer error (e.g., change of mind, wrong size selection), return shipping costs will be borne by the customer and will be deducted from the refund amount.

section3.p2: For returns due to defective, damaged, or incorrectly described products, we will refund the full amount including the original shipping fee and return shipping costs.

section4.title: 4. Exchanges
section4.p1: If you prefer to exchange the product instead of receiving a refund, please specify this in your initial return request. Exchanges are only available for the same product in a different size or color, subject to availability.
section4.p2: The exchange process is similar to the return process. After receiving the returned product, we will ship the replacement product to you. If there is a price difference, we will refund or charge the difference accordingly.

section5.title: 5. Defective or Damaged Products
section5.p1: If you receive a product that is defective, damaged, or not as described, please contact us within 48 hours of receiving the order. We will ask you to provide photos of the defective product for assessment.
section5.p2: For defective products, we will provide one of the following solutions, depending on the severity of the issue and product availability:

list.item2: Replace with an identical or equivalent product
list.item4: Partial discount if the defect is minor and does not affect the product's functionality

section6.title: 6. Warranty
section6.p1: Many of our products come with a manufacturer's warranty. The warranty terms and conditions will be specified in the product description or documentation accompanying the product. To claim warranty, please contact our customer service with proof of purchase and a description of the issue.
